Articles.Content:
Hi, I used to play this game on my old system with everything maxed out and no issues at all. I upgraded my system and now I can't play the game. It freezes every single time. I always get Unity error 2019.4.18f1_3310a4d4f880. 

The only part of my pc I didn't upgrade was my gpu, which I kept.

My Specs:
CPU i9-12900K
Ram: 64GB
GPU: GTX 1080

I also upgraded my monitor to a hd ultra-wide one, but it seems no matter what resolution I use it always crash.

I tried the game with mods and without to same result.
Any hints can someone offer me?
Thanks in advance.

Player.log: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1rkFanZB1x1_5xSbrjnQVNFcg5SIsm-22?usp=sharing

KSP.log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-VIclepXz0fFyqvPZsSYa06evdcEJNmZ/view?usp=drive_link

Edited April 14 by WBruce
